basics.name: Tasuhiro Davide Kato
basics.tagline: IT Support & AI Developer - Turning ideas into intelligent solutions through code

achievements: Management of company IT infrastructure and user support (Windows systems)
Automatic PRN file reader with QR code and barcode recognition
Software for scanning company filesystem permissions
User-friendly database interfaces
Telegram bot for monitoring access to company gates
Software for scanning domain PCs (PC management tool)
User lock monitoring software
Software to automate company PC setups
Software for inventory of installed programs
Single Board Computer configuration (khadas, ubuntu 24.04)
Linux Server red hat configuration for docker with portainer.
GLPI configuration inside container and plugin customization
Local n8n configuration for automation, also with AI
Helpdesk and user support (Windows systems)
HMI panel configuration for production
Development of internal tools (Visual Studio Code, Visual Studio, DevExpress)
PLC programming (KOP, AWL, SCL)
Training on PLC programming languages
Support for the development of industrial automation systems
Study assistance for primary school children
